response.overview: A demon from the planet "Torturina" has come to earth and is looking to capture and murder all humans that have committed sins. But there is only one person who can help these people, and that person is Mr Piggy. With the help of the multiverse, Mr Piggy looks to stop this evil demon from killing his people and saving his planet.
response.tagline: MR PIGGY IS THE WORLDS ONLY HOPE, CAN HE SAVE THEM?
response.title: Mr Piggy: Shadow of Torturina
